description: Improve simulator stats display by separating player stats by team and putting team stats and player stats in their own separate cards
goal: Better UX for viewing game statistics - clearer separation between team-level stats and individual player box scores, with player stats organized by team
requirements: Separate team stats into their own Card component
Separate player stats (box score) into their own Card component
Within player stats, separate players by team (Away vs Home)
Add team identifier to PlayerGameStats so filtering is possible
Maintain existing stat categories (passing, rushing, receiving, defense)
constraints: Keep existing SimStats and PlayerGameStats types compatible
Use existing UI component library (Card, Tabs, ScrollArea)
